meanings.sent1: The riddle was unanswerable, leaving everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The math problem was unanswerable, even for the smartest student.
meanings.sent3: The unanswerable question made the whole class burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her unanswerable logic was like a locked door, impossible to open.
meanings.sent5: The unanswerable mystery of the missing keys haunted him all day.

meanings.definition: Not able to be answered or responded to.
meanings.sent1: The unanswerable phone call left him wondering who it was.
meanings.sent2: The unanswerable email sat in his inbox, waiting for a reply.
meanings.sent3: His unanswerable excuse for being late made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The unanswerable silence between them spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The unanswerable question hung in the air, creating tension in the room.
